data.name: Blitz in the Paper Kingdom
data.detailed_description:
Blitz in the Paper Kingdom is a refreshing new tower defense experience.

The paper kingdom is under attack from the evil Vilmos! His aim is to send his fast hordes of minions to destroy the sacred statues spread across the kingdom. Take control of one of 4 heroes to put a stop to his evil scheme!

Travel through 25 levels in a sketchbook come to life in this tower defense game. Take control of your character and upgrade your towers. Play solo or up to 4-player in local co-op. Earn in-game currency to unlock new characters, costumes, gallery items and more! Increase the speed multiplier as well as the enemy count multiplier to hit new high scores. Support for Blitz in the Paper Kingdom will continue for the foreseeable future, adding polish, content and more.



Features:
Single player campaign and arcade mode
4 player local co-op and remote play in both campaign and arcade
Full support for PS4, PS5, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Xbox Series X and more controllers
25 playable levels
4 playable characters, with unlockable costumes, additional playable characters, features and more
Your character’s speed, power & more can be upgraded during a match and are reset afterwards
The game speed and enemy counts can be multiplied to add challenge and boost your score

data.short_description: Blitz in the Paper Kingdom is an indie tower defense game, set in a pop-up sketch book. Players can place automated towers while controlling a character to defeat enemies and defend the king's statues.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated graphics
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060-6GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Unbuntu 18.04 or later
  • Processor: 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated graphics
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Unbuntu 18.04 or later
  • Processor: 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060-6GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY
